Real Estate Investing for Everyone

We’re Modiv and we’re on a mission to motivate, educate and empower everyone to take the next step.

How it Works Investments

Get Modivated & diversify your portfolio with REITs

Modiv invites investors to invest in a portfolio of revenue-producing commercial real estate properties through a Real Estate Investment Trust (REIT).

  • Reduce overall portfolio risk and enjoy competitive returns
  • Earn steady dividend income
  • Benefit from long-term capital appreciation
  • Enjoy portfolio diversification – low correlation to many other assets such as equities and other fixed income investments

What’s unique about Modiv?

Modiv introduces a low-cost opportunity to invest in commercial real estate. Learn more about Modiv and get started today!

  • REITs are required to distribute at least 90% of their taxable income to their shareholders annually
  • Dividends are fueled by a stable stream of contractual rents paid by tenants of the portfolio properties

How it works?

Tenants pay us rent which we distribute to you

You Invest

You can buy shares and own a piece of a Real Estate Investment Trust (REIT).

Tenants pay rent

Our portfolio of properties generates monthly rental payments from our tenants.

The REIT distributes taxable income

We set out to pay you cash distributions each month from the rental income our tenants pay.

Why Choose Modiv

We want you to be confident in your investments. Modiv takes its due diligence process very seriously and only chooses deals that pass our set of requirements.

  • Our tenants are recognizable creditworthy tenants
  • Our offerings focus on single-tenant office, industrial and retail properties
  • We want you to be confident in your investments. Modiv takes its due diligence process very seriously and only chooses deals that pass our set of requirements.
